title: Jennifer Aniston shares a throwback clip of her famous exchange
text:
Jennifer Aniston brought new life to a well-known scene she shared on the NBC hit Friends with Reese Witherspoon on Thursday when she shared a clip of it via Instagram.

The moment captured was from the episode The One With Rachel's Sister that first aired in 2000.

And twenty years later, a 50-year-old Aniston paid homage to her 43-year-old costar Reese Witherspoon, whom she is currently working with on a web series titled The Morning Show, in the caption of the clip.

Spat: Jennifer Aniston brought new life to a well-known scene she shared on the NBC hit Friends with Reese Witherspoon on Thursday when she shared a clip of it via Instagram

'My pain in the a** little burst of sunshine sister and I are working together again. But this time, we’ll be much kinder to one another. (Hmm, then again, we’ll just have to wait and see about that...),' she wrote.

The clip starts with an infuriated Rachel Green, played by Aniston, who shouts at her sister Jill, played by Witherspoon: 'This is about you being a brat, wanting what you can't have.'

'Can't have? Excuse me, the only thing I can't have is dairy!' Reese retorts back.

In-scene: The moment captured was from the episode The One With Rachel's Sister that first aired in 2000

The clip comes as Aniston joined Instagram for the first time less than a week ago.

She reached 1M followers in just 45 minutes and has received over 1M likes on each post.

Aniston is dead-set on making sure that her habits on the platform don't become 'addictive.'

Focused: Aniston is dead-set on making sure that her habits on the platform don't become 'addictive'

'I decided to get two different phones,' she told the Los Angeles Times.

'So one sits in my office and when that [Instagramming] has to happen, I’ll commit to that,' she said.

When asked why she was hesitant to hop the bandwagon in the first place, she replied with a basic answer.

'The thing I don’t want to do, which was always a hesitation for me in the beginning, is be consumed by it,' she told the outlet. 'I don’t want to become distracted like that.'

Reunited: For her first photo Aniston posted a selfie alongside her Friends costars Courteney Cox, Matthew Perry, Lisa Kudrow, Matt LeBlanc and David Schwimmer

She continued: 'I already get distracted enough by other things in life.

'But I’m very happy that it seems to have been a fun thing and that it seems to be well received.

'I could see how it’s fun to creatively put those little bits together, be funny, make fun of yourself and have fun just in general.

'And being able to connect with fans and it makes them very happy.'
description: Jennifer Aniston brought new life to a well-known scene she shared on the NBC hit Friends with Reese Witherspoon on Thursday when she shared a clip of it via Instagram.
